articles.title: NASA Just Detected the Most Powerful Gamma-ray Bursts Close to Earth - News18
articles.description: Gamma-ray-bursts (GRB) were unintentionally found by American military satellites in the 1960s. Their creation most likely took place when a massive star exploded towards the end of their lives and turned into a black hole.
